entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
